title: Mmm, cookies
body: As suggested by Fyse, I've added a small cookie to the comments section to remember all your information so you don't have to enter it every single time you leave an amazingly thoughful comment. Aren't I nice? Now you have NO excuse NOT to leave 100 comments per POST per DAY! Yee haw!
author: Dan

comments.author: Otto
comments.body: Would it be too naggy to ask for RSS feed now? (asking doesn't hurt) :)

comments.author: bjork24
comments.body: I suppose not. I'll build that next week.

comments.author: Fyse
comments.body: Let's see if this works then...

comments.author: Fyse
comments.body: Ooooh, and work it does! Good job, Mr Moxie. If you thought I left a lot of comments before...

comments.author: Fyse
comments.body: Only problem, it seemed to add an 'no-reply' email address for me automatically. It probably wont do it now...

comments.author: Oz
comments.body: Hey, Dan, while you're busy adding things, don't forget to add a link to your "idea" on that website where you could get $25,000.  If they ever sent you the link.

comments.author: thefoxymama
comments.body: Yay, it works!  The last time I tried to leave a comment it got reeeeealllly complicated for some danged reason.  But I've been over to see you...yes I have.

comments.author: bjork24
comments.body: Ah ha! I'm glad you all like it. I fixed the "no-reply@blogger.com" e-mail bug. Next up, RSS!

comments.author: bjork24
comments.body: Oz: they turned me down, unfortunately. More to come...

comments.author: nicole
comments.body: We bought crispy oatmeal chocolate chip cookies at Trader Joe's today. I'll be in the back eating them in case anyone needs me...

comments.author: bjork24
comments.body: Mmm, I'll be back there soon.

comments.author: bjork24
comments.body: Luke: Are you referring to the ones from Trader Joe's? Mmmm, cookies.

comments.author: Luke
comments.body: Well those and the one that means I don't have to type my own info.  Mmmm crispy oatmeal chocolate chip.  Mmmmm lazy Luke types less.
